Dec. 1, 1985 D Huddersfield & District BBA Contest (Section B)
Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section B) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest huddersfield-district-bba-december-conte-4824
None
Huddersfield Town Hall, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £50 and trophy, 2nd £40, 3rd £30, 4th £20. 5 bands competed.
Nov. 10, 2012, 1:11 p.m. June 27, 2016, 9:18 p.m.
1 Warren Band Duncan Beckley Celebration [Ball]
2 Meltham and Meltham Mills Band Jack Fisher The Aeronauts
3 Boarshurst 'B' Eric Landon Sinfonietta for Brass Band [Langford]
4 Todmorden Old Band Steve Hartley Promenade
5 Hinchliffe Mill Band R. Broadhead Partita [Gregson]
Withdrawn Boarshurst Silver Band Dave Morris
